product_name: CliniqueGreat Skin Everywhere Skincare Gift Set for Combination Oily Skin
summary: SummaryClinique Great Skin Everywhere Set: For Oily Combination Skin includes Clinique’s dermatologist-developed 3-Step system in full + travel sizes.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Oily CombinationClinique's dermatologist-developed 3-Step skincare gives oilier skin exactly what it needs to be great-looking skin.All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Oily Skin Formula cleanses gently.Clarifying Lotion 3 sweeps away dulling flakes and excess oil to reveal smoother, clearer-looking skin.Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel strengthens skin’s moisture barrier so moisture stays in. Oil-free gel slips on easily, absorbs quickly.Free of: parabens and phthalates.Dermatologist developed. Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.IncludesFull Size All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Oily Skin Formula (6.7 oz)Jumbo Clarifying Lotion 3 Twice A Day Exfoliator (16.5 oz)Full Size Dramatically Different Moisturizing GelAll About Clean Liquid Facial Soap (1.0 oz)Clarifying Lotion 3 Twice A Day Exfoliator (2.0 oz)Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel (1.0 oz)Item 2641056How To UseAll About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Oily Skin Formula: Use face cleanser twice a day, morning and night. Lather between palms with lukewarm water. Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry.Clarifying Lotion 3 Twice A Day Exfoliator: Use lotion toner twice a day, morning and night. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck. For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel: Use moisturizing gel twice a day, morning and night, after cleansing with Facial Soap and exfoliating with Clarifying Lotion. Apply to face and throat all over, or where needed.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Oily Skin Formula: Use face cleanser twice a day, morning and night. Lather between palms with lukewarm water. Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry.Clarifying Lotion 3 Twice A Day Exfoliator: Use lotion toner twice a day, morning and night. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck. For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel: Use moisturizing gel twice a day, morning and night, after cleansing with Facial Soap and exfoliating with Clarifying Lotion. Apply to face and throat all over, or where needed.

reviews.headline: Perfect gift set!
reviews.comments: Bought as a gift for my daughter for the second time she loves it!
